content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5)
Current status: Furnaces idle with no ingredients, chests contain 56 and 50 iron plates respectively

### Additional Storage (Position x=5.5, y=2.5-3.5)
Consists of:
- One wooden chest at position (5.5,3.5)
- One burner inserter at position (5.5,2.5)
Current status: Chest is empty

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)
Current status: Furnaces idle with no ingredients, chests contain 53 and 84 copper plates respectively

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=33.5-37.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5,35.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5,35.5)
- Electric pole network connecting from (0.5,22.5) to (13.5,33.5)
Current status: System partially operational, boiler needs fuel

### Unused Structures
- Offshore pump at position (-5.5,26.5) - not connected to any system
- Lab (position not specified) - currently inactive with no research in progress

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Errors
- Research automation technology before attempting to craft items that require it (like assembling machine 1)
- Ensure you have the necessary science packs before starting research

### Crafting System Errors
- Some items (like iron plates) cannot be crafted directly and require proper production facilities (furnaces)
- When crafting complex items, ensure all prerequisites are available:
  - Check if the recipe is unlocked through technology
  - Verify you have all required ingredients
  - Use appropriate crafting facilities for items that cannot be hand-crafted

### Power System Issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain power generation
- Ensure proper fluid connections between power system components
